issues.description:
In the function `withdrawOld(address)` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to an address taken from function arguments.
It seems that this function can be called without restrictions.
issues.title: Ether send

issues.description:
In the function `withdraw(uint256)` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to msg.sender.
It seems that this function can be called without restrictions.
issues.title: Ether send

issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `getTokensForEther(uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:

The subtraction may result in a value < 0.
issues.title: Integer Underflow
